chapter.verse: And these the names of the tribes: From the extremity north to the hand of the way of Hethlon to go to Hamath, the enclosure of the fountain, the bound of Damascus northward to the hand of Hamath, and they were to him the east side, the sea, Dan, one.
And upon the bound of Dan from the side east even to the side of the sea, Asher, one.
And upon the bound of Asher from the side east even to the side of the sea, Naphtali, one.
And by the bound of Naphtali from the side east even to the side of the sea, Manasseh, one.
And upon the bound of Manasseh from the side east even to the side of the sea, Ephraim, one.
And upon the bound of Ephraim to the side east, even to the side of the Rea, Reuben, one.
And upon the bound of Reuben from the side east even to the side of the sea, Judah, one.

And upon the bound of Judah from the side east even to the side of the sea, shall be the oblation which ye shall lift up, five and twenty thousand the breadth, and the length as one of the portions from the side east, even to the side of the sea: and the holy place was in the midst of it.
The oblation which ye shall lift up to Jehovah, the length, five and twenty thousand, and the breadth, ten thousand.

And to these shall be the holy oblation to the priests; the north, five and: twenty thousand, and to the sea, the breadth ten thousand, and eastward, the breadth ten thousand, and to the south, the length five and twenty thousand, and the holy place of Jehovah was in: the midst of it.
To the priests being consecrated: of the sons of Zadok, who watched my watches, who went not astray in the going astray of the sons of Israel, as the Levites went astray.
And the oblation from the oblation of the land shall be to them holy of holies to the bound of the Levites.
And the Levities over against the bound of the priests, five and twenty thousand the length, and the breadth ten thousand: all the length five and twenty thousand, and the breadth ten thousand.
And they shall not sell from it and it shall not be exchanged, and he shall not cause the first-fruits to pane away, for it is holy to Jehovah.
And the five thousand being left in the breadth upon the face of the five and twenty thousand, this profane the city for dwelling and for an area, and the city was in the midst of it.

And these its measures: the side north, five hundred and four thousand, and the south side five hundred and four thousand, and from the side east five hundred and four thousand, and the side of the sea, five hundred and four thousand.
And the area was to the city northward, fifty and two hundred, and south, fifty and two hundred, and east, fifty and two hundred, and the sea, fifty and two hundred.

And the remainder in the length over against the oblation of holiness, ten thousand eastward, and ten thousand to the sea: and it was over against the oblation of the holy place; and its Produce was for bread to the servants of the city.
And serving the city they shall serve it from all the tribes of Israel.
All the oblation five and twenty thousand by five and twenty thousand: four square ye shall lift up the oblation of holiness for a possession of the city.

And the remainder to the prince, from hence and from thence to the oblation of the holy place, and to the possession of the city at the face of five and twenty thousand of the oblation even to the bound eastward, and the sea, upon the face of five and twenty thousand upon the bound of the sea, over against the portions to the prince: and it was the oblation of holiness; and the holy place of the house in the midst of it.

From the possession of the Levites from the possession of the city, in the midst of that to the prince, it shall be between the bound of Judah and between the bound of Benjamin, to the prince it shall be.
And the rest of the tribes, from the side east even to the side of the sea, Benjamin, one.
And upon the bound of Benjamin from the side east even to the side of the sea, Simeon, one.
And upon the bound of Simeon from the side east even to the side of the sea, Issachar, one.
And upon the bound of Issachar from the side east even to the side of the sea, Zebulon, one.
And upon the bound of Zebulon from the side east even to the side of the sea, Gad, one.
And upon the bound of Gad at the side south southward, the bound shall be from Tamar, the waters of contradiction of Kadesh, the torrent to the great sea.
This the land which ye shall cause to fall for inheritance to the tribes of Israel, and these their portions, says the Lord Jehovah.
And these the goings out of the city from the side north, five hundred and four thousand the measure.
And the gates of the city for the names of the tribes of Israel, three gates north; the gate of Reuben, one; the gate of Judah, one; the gate of Levi, one.
And to the side east, five hundred and four thousand: and three gates; the gate of Joseph, one; the gate of Benjamin, one; the gate of Dan, one;
And the side south, five hundred and four thousand the measure: and three gates; the gate of Simeon, one; the gate of Issachar, one; the gate of Zebulon, one.
The side of the sea five hundred and four thousand; three gates; the gate of Gad, one; the gate of Asher, one; the gate of Naphtah, one.
Bound about eighteen thousand: and the name of the city from the day, Jehovah them.
